ACTIONS.LABEL: Actions
ACTIONS.TOOLTIP: Actions for the data of the table row

COPY.LABEL: Copy
COPY.DATA: Create a new Workspace with the data

CREATE.LABEL: Create
CREATE.ROLE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Role was not created.
CREATE.MENU.TOOLTIP: Create a new Menu Item below

SLOT.MESSAGE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Slot was not created.

MESSAGE.CREATE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Workspace was not created.
MESSAGE.ROLE_ALREADY_EXISTS: A Role with this name already exists
MESSAGE.MENU_ALREADY_EXIST: A Menu Item with that name/id already exists
MESSAGE.MENU_CREATE_OK: The Menu Item was created successfully
MESSAGE.MENU_CREATE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Menu Item was not created.

WORKSPACE.MESSAGE: Do you want to delete this Workspace?
WORKSPACE.MESSAGE_INFO_OPERATOR: This Workspace was created by automation. It is deletable but it will be recreated by automation.
WORKSPACE.MESSAGE_REJECT_MANDATORY: The Workspace is marked as required for operation and therefore cannot be deleted.
WORKSPACE.MESSAGE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Workspace could not be deleted.

MENU.MESSAGE: Do you want to delete this Menu Item?
MENU.MESSAGE_CHILDREN: This will also delete all Menu Items below.
MENU.MESSAGE_OK: The Menu Item was deleted successfully
MENU.MESSAGE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Menu Item could not be deleted.

ROLE.MESSAGE: Do you want to delete this Role?
ROLE.MESSAGE_INFO: This deletes the Role and its assignments for the Workspace. Does not changed anycthing in Permission Management.
ROLE.MESSAGE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Role was not deleted.

SLOT.LABEL: Delete Slot
SLOT.LABEL.COMPONENTS: Deleting slot not possible because components are still assigned.
SLOT.MESSAGE: Do you want to delete this Slot?
SLOT.MESSAGE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Slot was not deleted.
SLOT.DEREGISTER_COMPONENTS: Do you want to deregister selected Components from Slot?
SLOT.DEREGISTER_OK: The assignment of Slot to Components were deleted successfully
SLOT.DEREGISTER_NOK: An error has occurred. The assignment of Slot to Components were not deleted.

PRODUCT.MESSAGE: Do you want to deregister selected Applications?
PRODUCT.MESSAGE_INFO: The selected Applications and their apps are deregistered from the Workspace. Menu items that use such paths are not touched but no longer work.

EDIT.LABEL: Edit
EDIT.ROLE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Role was not changed.
EDIT.SLOT_NOK: An error has occurred. The Slot was not changed.

MESSAGE.CHANGE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Workspace was not changed.
MESSAGE.ROLE_ALREADY_EXISTS: A Role with this name already exists
MESSAGE.MENU_CHANGE_OK: The Menu Item was changed successfully
MESSAGE.MENU_CHANGE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Menu Item was not changed.

EXPORT.LABEL: Export
EXPORT.MENU: Export Menu definition in JSON format
EXPORT.WORKSPACE: Download the current Workspace definition in JSON format.

NAVIGATION.GOTO_PRODUCT_SLOTS: Go to Slot overview within Application Store

TOOLTIPS.ROLES: Management of the Roles usable by the Workspace (as an subset of Tenant roles)
TOOLTIPS.SLOTS: Management of the Slots usable by the Workspace.
TOOLTIPS.PRODUCTS: Management of Applications usable in the Workspace

INTERNAL.MANDATORY_TRUE: This workspace is required for operation. Therefore, it cannot be deleted.
INTERNAL.OPERATOR_MESSAGE: This Workspace was created by automation. All changes will be lost on the next deployment.

TOOLTIPS.CREATION_USER: ID of the user of the creation
TOOLTIPS.MODIFICATION_USER: ID of the user of the last change
TOOLTIPS.MANDATORY: If set then this Workspace is required for operation and therefore the Workspace cannot be deleted.
TOOLTIPS.OPERATOR: If set, the Workspace was created by automation. All changes will be lost during the next deployment.

TOOLTIPS.BASE_URL: Base path in the workspace's web address
TOOLTIPS.DISABLED: If set then the workspace can be configured but cannot be used.
TOOLTIPS.DISPLAY_NAME: Displayed name of this workspace, can be changed
TOOLTIPS.FOOTER_LABEL: Label text displayed in the footer of the page
TOOLTIPS.HOME_PAGE: Home page of the workspace, which is displayed when no specific Application is navigated to.
TOOLTIPS.NAME: Unique name that cannot be changed because it is used as a reference to this workspace.
TOOLTIPS.THEME.READONLY: Reference to the used Theme. Theme selection not possible.

TOOLTIP.BADGE: Icon from the PrimeNG library which should be displayed next to the Menu name
TOOLTIP.DISABLED: If set, then the Menu Item is not displayed.
TOOLTIP.EXTERN: If set, the OneCX Shell will be exited when the Menu Item is used. Requires a value in Path/URL.
TOOLTIP.TARGET: If set, the target will be opened in a new TAB when the Menu Item is used. Requires a value in Path/URL.
TOOLTIP.MENU_ID: A unique identifier of the Menu Item
TOOLTIP.PARENT_ID: The identifier of the parent Menu Item
TOOLTIP.PARENT_NAME: The name of the parent Menu Item
TOOLTIP.POSITION: An integer number that determines the position of the Menu Item below the parent Menu Item. If changed manually, the successor gets this position number increased by 1 and so on.
TOOLTIP.URL: The URL accessed by the Menu Item. Selection from list and/or manual changes/extensions possible.

HEADER.DETAIL: Display and editing of the Workspace properties

QUICK_LINKS.GOTO_WORKSPACE: Open Workspace in a new TAB

ORIGIN.IAM.VIEW: This Role only exists in Identity Management (IDM) and therefore cannot be changed here.
ORIGIN.WORKSPACE.EDIT: This Role only exists in Workspace and not in Identity Management (IDM).
ORIGIN.IAM.WORKSPACE.EDIT: This Role exists in Identity Management (IDM) and Workspace (same name). However, a change only affects the Workspace role.

QUICK_FILTER.LABEL: Registration
QUICK_FILTER.ALL.TOOLTIP: All = Regardless of the status of registration
QUICK_FILTER.OUTDATED.TOOLTIP: Marked as outdated - please do not use anymore

TOOLTIPS.COMPONENTS: Manage assignments of components to the Slot
TOOLTIPS.PRODUCTS: Applications, which have declared this Slot

SLOT.WORKSPACE: Slot is registered for the Workspace
SLOT.UNREGISTERED.TOOLTIP: Slot is not registered for the Workspace
SLOT.CREATE.TOOLTIP: Register this Slot for the Workspace.
SLOT.DEPRECATED.TOOLTIP: This Slot is outdated and will no longer be usable in the foreseeable future.
SLOT.UNDEPLOYED.TOOLTIP: This Slot is no longer usable.
SLOT.UNDEPLOYED.COMPONENT.TOOLTIP: This Component is no longer usable.
SLOT.PRODUCTS.TOOLTIP: Applications that have registered this Slot:
SLOT.NO_PRODUCTS: No Application found which has registered this Slot
SLOT.COMPONENTS.USED.TOOLTIP: Components used in the slot, in order from top to bottom.
SLOT.COMPONENTS.NOT_USED.TOOLTIP: List of available components declared via the registered Applications.

MESSAGES.CREATE_NOK: An error has occurred during Slot registration
MESSAGES.REGISTRATION_NOK: An error has occurred during Component registration
MESSAGES.REGISTRATIONS_NOK: An error has occurred during Component registration
MESSAGES.DEREGISTRATION_NOK: An error has occurred during Component deregistration
MESSAGES.DEREGISTRATIONS_NOK: An error has occurred during Component deregistration

MENU.LABEL: Menu

HEADER.TREE_MODAL.TOOLTIP: Reorder of Menu Items via Drag & Drop and Preview in configured languages
HEADER.DISPLAYED_ITEM: Change node label: Menu Item Name / ID / Language
HEADER.DISPLAYED_ITEM.NAME: Name

MENU.SUBHEADER: Manage details and Role assignments of the Workspace Menu

SECTIONS.ACTIONS: Actions: Move menu items, filter, go to other pages
SECTIONS.OPTIONS: Display options: Expand/collapse tree, select menu item text, choose whether to display details or roles

TREE.POSITION.TOOLTIP: Position path of the Menu Item in format [parent item.]item
TREE.URL.TOOLTIP: The URL to be called upon activation
TREE.PRODUCT.TOOLTIP: Indicator whether the Menu URL is offered by a registered Application
TREE.EXTERN.TOOLTIP: If this option is enabled, the OneCX Shell will be exited
TREE.TARGET.TOOLTIP: If this option is enabled, the destination will be opened in a new TAB.

ROLE.FILTER: Role filter: Display Menu Items according to the selected Roles
ROLE.FILTER.DISPLAY_ROLES.TOOLTIP: Filter for Role name for displaying role column
ROLE.FILTER.LABEL: Role filter
ROLE.FILTER.NAME: Click to add/remove Role name to filter

MENU.MENU_ITEM_NOT_FOUND: Cannot find Menu Item with ID:

IMPORT.UPLOAD_INFO: Please, upload JSON file from your device. Keep in mind, that after upload whole Menu structure will be overwritten.
IMPORT.UPLOAD_NOK: An error has occurred. The Menu structure wasn't overwritten

PRODUCTS.PS_PRODUCTS.TOOLTIP: List of available Applications in Application Store which are not yet registered
PRODUCTS.UNDEPLOYED: This Application can no longer be used. Further use leads to error messages.
PRODUCTS.CHANGED_MFE: There are important changes in the Application.

MESSAGES.DOES_NOT_EXIST: The assigned Application does not exist
MESSAGES.ALREADY_EXISTS: The path is already in use
MESSAGES.UPDATE_NOK: An error has occurred during Application update
MESSAGES.REGISTRATION_NOK: An error has occurred during Application registration
MESSAGES.REGISTRATIONS_NOK: An error has occurred during Application registration
MESSAGES.DEREGISTRATION_NOK: An error has occurred during Application deregistration
MESSAGES.DEREGISTRATIONS_NOK: An error has occurred during Application deregistration

PRODUCT.DISPLAY_NAME.TOOLTIP: The display name is used when pages of the Application are accessed and thus appears in the browser history.
PRODUCT.BASE_URL.TOOLTIP: Base path for all Modules in the Application. Must be unique for all Applications in the Workspace.

MFE.APP_ID.TOOLTIP: Unique ID of the specific UI service to be used.
MFE.BASE_PATH.TOOLTIP: Path appended to the Application base path for accessing the specific Module.

WORKSPACE_EXPORT.THEME_CHECKBOX_MESSAGE: Download the Workspace definition as JSON file.

WORKSPACE_IMPORT.PRODUCT_HINT: Only Applications that are known in the Application Store are imported.
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.THEME_NAME.TOOLTIP: Name of the used Theme. Can be changed later.
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.WORKSPACE_NAME.TOOLTIP: Unique name of the new Workspace. Uniqueness is checked in next step.
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.DISPLAY_NAME.TOOLTIP: Display name of the new Workspace, can be changed afterwards.
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.BASE_URL.TOOLTIP: Base URL of the Workspace. Must be unique because it is used to access the Workspace. Uniqueness is checked in next step

RESPONSE.SKIPPED: The Workspace was skipped by the import.
RESPONSE.ERROR: An error occurred, the Workspace could not be created/updated.

BASE_URL.EXISTS_MESSAGE: A Workspace with this Base URL already exists (Case insensitive).

WORKSPACE.EXISTS_MESSAGE: A Workspace with this name/display name already exists (Case insensitive).

WORKSPACE_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_KEY_MISSING: The key is missing in a Menu Item
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_NAME_MISSING: The name is missing in a Menu Item
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_WRONG_POSITION: In a Menu Item, the value for 'position' is not a number
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_WRONG_DISABLED: In a Menu Item, the value for 'disabled' is not a boolean
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_WRONG_WORKSPACEEXIT: In a Menu Item, the value for 'workspaceExit' is not a boolean
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.IMPORT_NOK: An error occurred, the Workspace could not be imported.

UPLOAD.NOK: The file was not uploaded successfully.

CONSTRAINT.FILE_TYPE: The following image formats are accepted: jpg, jpeg, png, svg
CONSTRAINT.NAME: Please add a Workspace name before uploading a file.
CONSTRAINT.SIZE: The image file size exceeds the maximum length of 100,000 bytes.

TOOLTIPS.LOGO_SMALL: Logo - reduced size, e.g. for use in slim menu
TOOLTIPS.URL: As an alternative to uploading, a URL to an image can be specified here.

LIST_WORKSPACES_THEME.USED: The Theme is used by the following Workspaces:
LIST_WORKSPACES_THEME.UNUSED: The Theme is not used by any Workspace.

LIST_WORKSPACES_PRODUCT.USED: The Application is used by the following Workspaces:
